content.description: The following question refers to the topic of economic developments in the 1700s.
content.question: Which of the following best explains the increase in food supply in Europe in the 1700s?

choices.label: The increase in the urban population of Europe
The development of early forms of factory-based mass production
The migration of Europeans to overseas colonies
The transfer of plant species from the Americas to Europe

content.answer: The transfer of plant species from the Americas to Europe

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
